articles.description: Riddhima Kapoor & Bharat Sahni recall the latter meeting Rishi Kapoor for the first time. Riddhima recalls that her father was just 'glaring and staring' at Bharat the entire evening.
articles.content: However, Bharat hit it off with Riddhimas brother, actor Ranbir Kapoor, instantly. Ranbir was the first person I actually confided in when I told him about Bharat and he was the one who told mom that… [+341 chars]
